definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: in Gilead, near, perh. east of, Mahanaim (q.v.);—´[[לאׁ ד]] 2Sa 17:37 (LXX Lwdabar, Ladabar); Gr We rd. also [[לאׁ דְבָר]] Am 6:13 = same city (but v. Dr); = ´[[לוֹ ד]] 2Sa 9:4; 2Sa 9:5 (LXX Ladabar); perh. also intended in [[מִמַּחֲנַיִם עַד־גְּבוּל לִדְבִר]] Jos 13:26 (cf. Di Bla; LXX Daibwn, A Dabeir, LXXL Debhr); v. II. [[דְּבִיר]], p. 184 supr.
